[[Tony]] (brother)
[[Carlos]] (brother) }} '''Marie''' is an employee at [[Allesandro's]]. She instantly disliked Monica and her becoming the new head chef. This is because the previous head chef, [[Emilio]] is her father. Also among the employees are her brothers, [[Tony (Allesandro's employee)|Tony]] and [[Carlos]]. Sometime later, she stops harassing Monica when she realizes she could get sacked if she continues.
